interface.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Logger.DRAFT
interface.tp:docstring: An interface for requesting information from the Telepathy Logger service.

tp:member.name: Sender
tp:member.tp:docstring: The identifier of the contact who originated this message.

tp:member.name: Message
tp:member.tp:docstring: The body of the message sent to a 1-1 Chat or a Chat Room.

tp:member.name: Timestamp
tp:member.tp:docstring: Unix timestamp for the log entry

tp:docstring.p: It represents a single message, received or sent.

The receiver is implicit in the request: if the sender is the user, the receiver is the identifier in chat_id paramenter, if the sender is not the user, the user is consequently the receiver of the message

method.name: GetRecentEvents

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The account path for the TpAccount to which the conversation is related

arg.name: Identifier
arg.tp:docstring: The buddy's identifier for the conversation

arg.name: Type
arg.tp:docstring: The type of the events to return.

arg.name: Lines
arg.tp:docstring:
how many entries will be returned.
NOTE: to retreive information that would generate high traffic, use the library API approach instead of DBus.

method.tp:docstring: Request the last Lines entries of logs for the specified couple Account+Identifier.

arg.name: Favourite_Contacts
arg.tp:docstring: The favourite contacts, as an array of TpAccounts and their contact identifiers.

method.name: AddFavouriteContact

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The object path for the TpAccount to which the contact belongs

method.tp:docstring: Add a contact's designation as a favourite. This method may not be called until the service is ready. See the FavouriteContactsReady signal and FavouriteContactsIsReady property.

method.name: RemoveFavouriteContact

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: The object path for the TpAccount to which the contact belongs

method.tp:docstring: Remove a contact's designation as a favourite. This method may not be called until the service is ready. See the FavouriteContactsReady signal and FavouriteContactsIsReady property.

signal.name: FavouriteContactsChanged
signal.tp:docstring: The set of favourite contacts has changed.

arg.name: Account
arg.tp:docstring: An account associated with the contact.

arg.name: Added
arg.tp:docstring: List of contact identifiers of contacts which are now favourites.

arg.name: Removed
arg.tp:docstring: List of contact identifiers of contacts which are no longer favourites.
